author: vsiveton
msg: o fixed encoding for some bundles to UTF-8 (with BOM)

author: adrianc
msg: A couple of small UI fixups in the Party Manager view profile screen.I also removed the current date/time from the Shipper Account screenlet - not sure why that was put there. The current date/time is already in the masthead.If it is really needed, we can put it in the screenlet title bar.

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-962: fixed case where unhandled exception in addDocument or updateDocument could fail to delete unreferenced files in the index
